amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, provides that none of the funds in the bill may be used in contravention of section 303 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 which requires that alternative fueled vehicles be acquired by the Federal government for the Federal fleet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available in contravention of section 301 of the Energy Policy Act of 1992.

action.text: Engel amendment (A022) modified by unanimous consent. Modified form of the amendment was placed at the desk and considered as adopted pursuant to a unanimous consent agreement just prior to final passage.
On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A022) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
